title: Nexus3DS
long_description: Please refer to the README on the github repo for more info: https://github.com/2b-zipper/Nexus3DS/blob/master/README.md
author: 2b-zipper, cooolgamer, Rep, LumaTeam
script_message:
This is a fork of Luma3DS. Using alternate forks of Luma3DS can cause system instability and other unexpected issues.

If you experience any issues please reinstall the normal "Luma3DS" before anything else.
